company.name: TINSON S de RL de CV

about.me: Hi, my name is Jorge Quesada, I'm a Mechatronics engineer and I design and build wastewater treatment plants in Mexico, I heard about Cardano in January 2021, since then I'm running a stake Pool Called AGUA
about.server: Google Cloud, it's simple, Relieable, Scalable, 99.99% uptime, 2 relays, 1 hidden, 1 producer
about.company: The Objetive of AGUA it's simple, helping my community providing drinking water to low income people and issue awareness about Cardano Project and ecosystem.
